addCategory(string,uint256,uint256,uint2.details: Adds new category (Discontinued, moved functionality to newCategory)

params._actionHash: hash of details containing the action that has to be performed after proposal is accepted
params._allowedToCreateProposal: Member roles allowed to create the proposal
params._closingTime: Vote closing time for Each voting layer
params._contractAddress: address of contract to call after proposal is accepted
params._contractName: name of contract to be called after proposal is accepted
params._incentives: rewards to distributed after proposal is accepted
params._majorityVotePerc: Majority Vote threshold for Each voting layer
params._memberRoleToVote: Voting Layer sequence in which the voting has to be performed.
params._quorumPerc: minimum threshold percentage required in voting to calculate result

params._categoryId: is the category id in concern

categoryAction(uint256).return: the category idthe contract addressthe contract namethe default incentive

categoryActionDetails(uint256).details: Gets the category acion details of a category id

params._categoryId: is the category id in concern

categoryActionDetails(uint256).return: the category idthe contract addressthe contract namethe default incentiveaction function hash

categoryExtendedData(uint256).details: Gets category ab required and isSpecialResolution
categoryExtendedData(uint256).return: the category idif AB voting is requiredis category a special resolution

changeMasterAddress(address).details: Changes the master address and update it's instance

params._actionHash: hash of details containing the action that has to be performed after proposal is accepted
params._allowedToCreateProposal: Member roles allowed to create the proposal
params._categoryId: Category id that needs to be updated
params._closingTime: Vote closing time for Each voting layer
params._contractAddress: address of contract to call after proposal is accepted
params._contractName: name of contract to be called after proposal is accepted
params._incentives: rewards to distributed after proposal is accepted
params._majorityVotePerc: Majority Vote threshold for Each voting layer
params._memberRoleToVote: Voting Layer sequence in which the voting has to be performed.
params._quorumPerc: minimum threshold percentage required in voting to calculate result

isAuthorizedToGovern(address).details: checks if an address is authorized to govern

params._actionHash: hash of details containing the action that has to be performed after proposal is accepted
params._allowedToCreateProposal: Member roles allowed to create the proposal
params._closingTime: Vote closing time for Each voting layer
params._contractAddress: address of contract to call after proposal is accepted
params._contractName: name of contract to be called after proposal is accepted
params._incentives: rewards to distributed after proposal is accepted
params._majorityVotePerc: Majority Vote threshold for Each voting layer
params._memberRoleToVote: Voting Layer sequence in which the voting has to be performed.
params._quorumPerc: minimum threshold percentage required in voting to calculate result

proposalCategoryInitiate().details: Initiates Default settings for Proposal Category contract (Adding default categories)

totalCategories().details: Gets Total number of categories added till now

updateCategory(uint256,string,uint256,ui.details: Updates category details (Discontinued, moved functionality to editCategory)

params._actionHash: hash of details containing the action that has to be performed after proposal is accepted
params._allowedToCreateProposal: Member roles allowed to create the proposal
params._categoryId: Category id that needs to be updated
params._closingTime: Vote closing time for Each voting layer
params._contractAddress: address of contract to call after proposal is accepted
params._contractName: name of contract to be called after proposal is accepted
params._incentives: rewards to distributed after proposal is accepted
params._majorityVotePerc: Majority Vote threshold for Each voting layer
params._memberRoleToVote: Voting Layer sequence in which the voting has to be performed.
params._quorumPerc: minimum threshold percentage required in voting to calculate result

updateCategoryActionHashes().details: Initiates Default action function hashes for existing categories To be called after the contract has been upgraded by governance
